sense.def:
To require something
pomeni, da nam je tisto potrebno.

seg.quote: Parliamentary approval would be required for it.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
is required to do something
, mora tisto storiti, na primer zato, ker tako določa pravilo ali zakon.

seg.quote: All the boys were required to study religion.
He was doing what was required of him.
Check that the machines meet required standards.
